title: Never Take a Pig to Lunch: And Other Poems About the Fun of Eating (Orchard Paperbacks)
description: Here are more than 60 delicious poems that capture a child's-eye view of food, from the joys of eating pizza and ice cream to the art of avoiding liver and school lunch. Rollicking verses by Eve Merriam, Jack Prelutsky and others combined with vibrant, laugh-out loud illustrations ensure a book that children will devour. Full color.
author: Nadine Bernard Westcott
